basics.name: Jeng Yang (Jayden) Kong
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer with 3.5 years of experience and a Master's in Data Science, aspiring to transition into AI Engineering. Experienced in fine-tuning and deploying large language models (LLMs) and integrating AI solutions into production systems.

work.name: Daikin Holdings Singapore
work.summary: Led a team of 3 engineers in developing a Flutter-based application to visualize building HVAC power consumption data.
highlights: Led a team of 3 engineers in developing a Flutter-based application to visualize building HVAC power consumption data.
Collaborated with business teams to translate strategic objectives into software solutions, resulting in a 40% increase in revenue.
Optimized end-to-end data pipelines, reducing processing time by 25%.
Developed Python scripts to generate 24 months of realistic HVAC operational data, reducing data creation time by 80%.

work.name: FPLE Group
work.summary: Developed and maintained a high-performance eCommerce iOS application using Swift, UIKit, and MVVM architecture.
highlights: Delivered core features including secure user authentication, product catalog browsing, and shopping cart management.
Leveraged Combine for reactive programming and asynchronous data handling.
Applied SOLID principles rigorously, resulting in faster feature onboarding and enhanced modularity.
Designed and implemented reusable UI components adhering to Apple Human Interface Guidelines.

projects.name: WalletAI: AI-Powered Personal Financial Assistant Web App
projects.summary: Built a full-stack AI-powered personal finance tracking web application that enables users to query their financial data using natural language.
highlights: Implemented Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) by allowing users to upload financial documents.
Stored documents in Supabase vector database with gemini-embedding-001 embeddings.
Integrated Gemini 2.5 Flash API with function calling capabilities.
Designed a scalable PostgreSQL database schema with multi-currency support deployed on Vercel.

projects.name: Financial Text Sentiment Analysis Using LLM for Stock Market Prediction
projects.summary: Master's Thesis conducting research on applying Large Language Models to financial news sentiment analysis combined with historical OHLCV stock data.
highlights: Fine-tuned Large Language Models (Llama 3 8B, Gemma 7B) using QLORA on Financial PhraseBank.
Collected and preprocessed over 160k financial news articles via Polygon.io API.
Demonstrated that LSTM leveraging 7-day sentiment features delivered 10.9% RMSE reduction on TSLA stock predictions.
